definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Histologically, dentigerous cysts are lined by stratified squamous nonkeratinizing epithelium.
sentences.chinese: 组织学上含齿囊肿为多层鳞状未角化上皮细胞所覆盖。

sentences.english: In addition, the necrosis of spleen, bursa of Fabricius, thymus and convoluted tubular epithelia of kidney was seen.
sentences.chinese: 肾曲小管上皮细胞严重变性坏死等病理变化。
造孔处上皮化时间均在3个月以内。

sentences.english: Some mitochondria of the epithelial cells of renal tubules demonstrated vacuolation.
sentences.chinese: 肾小管上皮细胞线粒体肿胀空泡化。

sentences.english: Histologically they looked like the embryonic lung consisted of epithelial and mesenchymal elements.
sentences.chinese: 由上皮及间叶两个胚叶构成，状似胚胎肺。

sentences.english: The IAPP- IR cells distributed both in epithelium and in lamina propria during postnatal development.
sentences.chinese: IR细胞位于上皮细胞间及固有膜结缔组织中。

sentences.english: The shrimp hepatopancreas consists of a lot of epithelial tubules which are symmetrical.
sentences.chinese: 肝胰腺由两侧对称的分枝上皮小管组成。

sentences.english: Objective To study the suitable diagnostic methods for urothelial cancers.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨上尿路上皮癌合适的诊断方法。

sentences.english: Activity of IDH was maximal and of ME was minimal in epithelial organs.
sentences.chinese: 活动IDH是我的最大和最小的上皮机关。

sentences.english: Corneal epithelial injury is one of the most common keratopathy in external ophthalmopathy.
sentences.chinese: 角膜上皮损伤疾病是眼科门诊最常见的角膜病变之一。

sentences.english: Seen here within the glomeruli are crescents composed of proliferating epithelial cells.
sentences.chinese: 肾小球内由增生的壁层上皮细胞组成的新月体。

sentences.english: Thus we find that they, too, arise from an epithelium .
sentences.chinese: 因此我们发现，它们也起源于上皮组织。

sentences.english: Objective TO investigate the alteration of ion transport across the colonic epithelium in the rat descending colon applying by benzalkonium chloride (BAC).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨苯扎氯铵对大鼠降结肠上皮离子转运的影响。

sentences.english: In addition, we discussed the effects of several kinds of fixatives on the im…
sentences.chinese: 讨论了几种固定液对不同上皮细胞染色结果的影响。

sentences.english: Atypical mitotic figures were present in the epithelial and stromal cells.
sentences.chinese: 上皮细胞与间质细胞异型不明显，未见核分裂象。

sentences.english: The ductal system underwent atrophic changes, and thrombotic obliteration of main duct.
sentences.chinese: 导管系统上皮脱落，形成栓子阻塞导管。

definition: serosa/serous membrane (smooth moist delicate membranes lining body cavities)
(med.) endothelium/thin skin on the inside of some fruits (e.g. oranges)
growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
